title: The Top 5 Medicaid Planning Mistakes to Avoid
description: Navigating Medicaid planning can be a complex and challenging endeavor. This guide outlines the top five mistakes in Medicaid planning that people often make and how to avoid them, ensuring a smoother, more informed planning process.
